titleStmt.title: Sir Iohn Holland his speech in Parliament. Declaring the great and manifold grievances of this kingdome, both in church and common-wealth. Occasioned by the wicked practises and arbitrary power of the disturbers and subverters of our peace, our liberties, and our lawes. Published by a true copie.
titleStmt.author: Holland, John, Sir, 1603-1701.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
